tips.subject: Lightning Safety
tips.tip: Standing under a tree does not keep you safe from lightning.

tips.subject: Beach safety
tips.tip: Storms out at sea can create large waves that crash on the shore. Be aware of weather and ocean conditions when playing in the ocean.

tips.subject: Lightning Safety
tips.tip: Metal conducts electricity, but it does not attract it.

tips.subject: Cold Safety
tips.tip: Wind chill lowers the overall outside temperature.

tips.subject: Heat Safety
tips.tip: Light, cool foods like fruit help you stay cool in the heat.

tips.subject: Heat Safety
tips.tip: Light colored fabrics reflect the sun's rays and keep you cooler.

tips.subject: Water Safety
tips.tip: Bacteria levels in bodies of water rise after a storm because rain washes pollutants into them. They return to their normal level after about 72 hours (3 days).
